description: Increases the DEF of all Resonators in the team by 36% for 15 minutes. In multiplayer games, it only affects your own characters.
bgDescription: A staple food of the Jinzhou Garrison. It is a hearty bite easy to make and carry around. Each serving comes with a message about guarding the homeland and longing to remind the soldiers that although the night is long and endless, Jinzhou always have their backs.
